ResourceHeader.ResourceName: THEMIS Ground-based Vector Magnetic Field at Bettles, Alaska
ResourceHeader.Description: BETT is part of the University of Alaska Geophysical Institute Magnetometer Array (GIMA). This magnetometer records 3-axis magnetic field measurements at 2Hz frequency.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: We acknowledge NASA contract NAS5-02099 and V. Angelopoulos for use of data from the THEMIS Mission. Specifically:S. Mende and C. T. Russell for use of the data

InformationURL.Name: THEMIS Ground Magnetometer Data Center at UAF Geophysical Institute
InformationURL.Description: Web server for displaying and downloading THEMIS ground magnetometer data

InformationURL.Name: THEMIS Web site ground magnetometer page.
InformationURL.Description: THEMIS Web Site page on ground magnetometers. Contains links to papers, general purpose information and caveats.
